title: I’ll Never Break Your Heart
lyrics:
[intro] (Bb) (Gm) (Eb) (F)
From (Bb)the first day…  that I (Gm)saw your smiling face
Honey I (Eb)knew that we would be together for-(F)ever
When I (Bb)asked you out… You said (Gm)no, but I found out
Darling (Eb)that you'd been hurt… You felt that you'd never (F)love again (Eb-F)
 
[pre-chorus]
(Gm)I deserve a try ho(D)ney, just once
(Gm7)Give me a chance, and I'll (C7)prove this all wrong
You walked (Dm)in you were so quick to (G)judge
But (Eb)honey, he's nothing like (Eb-Eb)me [stop]
 
[chorus]
I'll never (Bb)break your heart
I'll never (Gm)make you cry
I'd rather (Eb)die, than live with-(Dm)out you
I'll give (Eb)you all of me, honey that's no lie
I'll never (Bb)break your heart
I'll never (Gm)make you cry
I'd rather (Eb)die, than live with-(Dm)out you
I'll give (Eb)you all of me, honey (Eb)that's (Eb)no (Eb)lie (Eb-stop)
 
(Bb)As time goes… by (Gm)you will get to know me
A (Eb)little more better… Girl that's the (F)way love goes (Eb)baby, (F)baby
And (Bb)I (I) know you're afraid (know you're afraid)
To (Gm)let your feelings show (feelings show)
And (Eb)I understand girl, it's time (F)to let go (girl, it's time to let go because)
 
[pre-chorus]
(Gm)I deserve a try ho(D)ney, just once
(Gm7)Give me a chance, and I'll (C7)prove this all wrong
You walked (Dm)in you were so quick to (G)judge
But (Eb)honey, he's nothing like (Eb)me darling why can't you (F-stop)see
 
[chorus]
I'll never (Bb)break your heart
I'll never (Gm)make you cry
I'd rather (Eb)die, than live with-(Dm)out you
I'll give (Eb)you all of me, honey that's no lie
I'll never (Bb)break your heart
I'll never (Gm)make you cry (I'll never make you cry)
I'd rather (Eb)die, than live with-(Dm)out you (Die, can't live without you)
I'll give (Eb)you all of me, honey that's no lie (I'll never break your heart)
 
[bridge]
(Dm) No way (no way), (D7) no how (make you cry)
(Eb)I-(Dm)I-(Gm)swear (oh I, oh I, I swear, honey I swear)
(Dm) No way (I’ll do your right), (D7) no how (‘cause I know how)
(Eb)I-(Dm)I-(Eb)I
 
[chorus]
I'll never (Bb)break your heart
I'll never (Gm)make you cry
I'd rather (Eb)die, than live with-(Dm)out you
I'll give (Eb)you all of me, honey that's no lie
I'll never (Bb)break your heart
I'll never (Gm)make you cry
I'd rather (Eb)die, than live with-(Dm)out you
I'll give (Eb)you all of me, honey (F)that's no lie
(Bb) [end]
